contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "they will not leave for my husband name or descendant" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: they will leave for my husband neither name nor descendant

contextId.occurrenceNote: This means that only if David went would his soldiers remain with him. Alternate translation: "only if you go will any of your men remain with you" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: if you do not go, not one man will remain with you

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in a positive form. Alternate translation: "I will only offer ... something that I have paid for" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: I will not offer ... anything that costs me nothing
